statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ 8 \\ 11 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -47 \\ -12 \\ -34 \\ 13 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -102 \\ -32 \\ -74 \\ 28 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
